snippet: The government shutdown reflects a political system that reinforces extremism. The news media system isn’t much different lately.
abstract: David Carr The Media Equation column notes some political analysts point to redistricting as cause of ideological extremism in Congress; holds polarized political map is now accompanied by a media ecosystem that is equally gerrymandered into districts of self-reinforcing discourse; cites trends in news consumption which find people assemble along separate media streams where they find mostly what they want to hear.
lead_paragraph: The government shutdown reflects a political system that reinforces extremism. The news media system isn’t much different lately.
